channel.title: crypto on hexablog
channel.description: Recent content in crypto on hexablog

item.title: RSA Cheatsheet
item.description: I made a RSA cheatsheet so I don’t have to search up about it every time. To generate a private key openssl genrsa 2024 > secret.key To generate a public key openssl rsa -pubout < secret.key > public.key To encrypt a plaintext openssl pkeyutl -encrypt -pubin -inkey public.key -in plaintext -out ciphertext To decrypt a ciphertext openssl pkeyutl -decrypt -inkey secret.key -in ciphertext -out plaintext
